summary: A small isle out at sea (new instance) that has a full quest chain around the arena that dominates the isle.
descriptionHtml:
At some point after you have been revealed as Dovahkiin the courier will deliver a message from Fromdar Arnesen, wealthy owner of Snowfall Isle and its arena, inviting you to participate in the gladiatorial combat. You can reach Snowfall Isle from the small ship, the Advent, docked just outside of Dawnstar.

Currently theory, no progress made quite yet.
author: PiloxRed
